sub_fields.label: Lede Headline
sub_fields.name: lede_headline
sub_fields.instructions: Use <br> for a line break and <span>...</span> to make things bold!

sub_fields.label: Lede Description
sub_fields.name: lede_description
sub_fields.instructions: The text that appears just under the headline

sub_fields.label: Parallax Image
sub_fields.name: parallax_image
sub_fields.instructions: The Image that moves in parallax

sub_fields.label: Left Aligned Title?
sub_fields.name: parallax-left-aligned
sub_fields.instructions: Centered by default

sub_fields.label: Parallax Subheadline
sub_fields.name: parallax_subheadline
sub_fields.instructions: Appears below the Parallax Title at a normal text size

sub_fields.label: Parallax External Link
sub_fields.name: parallax_external_link
sub_fields.instructions: Must be a proper URL format beginning with http://

sub_fields.label: Grid Blocks
sub_fields.name: grid_blocks
sub_fields.instructions: Minimum 2, Maximum 4

sub_fields.label: Grid Block - Image
sub_fields.name: grid_block_image
sub_fields.instructions: Grid Block images work best when they fit inside the same square resolution. For example, ideally, each image is centered within a 300x300px image

sub_fields.label: Grid Block - Title
sub_fields.name: grid_block_title
sub_fields.instructions: Appears under the image

sub_fields.label: Add CSS Class
sub_fields.name: class_addition
sub_fields.instructions: optional

sub_fields.label: Attribute Data
sub_fields.name: attribute_data
sub_fields.instructions: optional

sub_fields.label: Testimonial Position
sub_fields.name: testimonial_position
sub_fields.instructions: If this testimonial is next to a parallax image, you can choose to raise or lower the testimonial so that it overlaps with the parallax image

sub_fields.label: Limit Testimonial Width?
sub_fields.name: limit_testimonial_width
sub_fields.instructions: Enter the maximum width (in pixels) for this testimonial block. Leave at zero (0) for default functionality.

sub_fields.label: Cards
sub_fields.name: cards
sub_fields.instructions: Functions the same as the "Typical Course" module

sub_fields.label: Tables
sub_fields.name: tables
sub_fields.instructions: You can add multiple tables. Be sure to use the grey row as the Table Header.

sub_fields.label: Navigation Items
sub_fields.name: navigation_items
sub_fields.instructions: Technically we can have more or less navigation items, but sticking to 3 items for now.

sub_fields.label: Nav Item - Title
sub_fields.name: nav_item_title
sub_fields.instructions: Text above the image

sub_fields.label: Nav Item - Overlay Title
sub_fields.name: nav_item_overlay_title
sub_fields.instructions: Text overlaid upon the image

sub_fields.label: Nav Item - Caption
sub_fields.name: nav_item_caption
sub_fields.instructions: Appears below the image

sub_fields.label: Nav Link
sub_fields.name: nav_link
sub_fields.instructions: Links to existing pages.

sub_fields.label: Landing Page Nav Title
sub_fields.name: landing_page_navigation_title
sub_fields.placeholder: Learn more about our test prep services

sub_fields.label: Landing Page Nav Items
sub_fields.name: landing_page_navigation_items
sub_fields.instructions: Between 2-4 Items allowed for now

sub_fields.label: Nav Item URL
sub_fields.name: nav_item_url_external
sub_fields.instructions: Must be a properly formatted URL including http://
